text:
Photos of the whole family. My mum, dad, brother,
sister… Oh hey. Hello! Oh, there is a new

baby in the family. Hurray!
Oh no! Sorry, I´ll be back in a minute.

Shhhh. Oh sorry. Shhh. Oh, baby, quiet. Oh
look, what is it? Yeah, it´s a baby. Say

it like a baby. It´s a baby. Well done. Now
quietly. What is it? It´s a baby. What is

it? It´s a baby. Yeah. The baby likes to
sleep. She always wants to sleep. There we

go. Ok. Shhhhh. Be quiet.
Hey Steve! Steve!

Maggie! Shhhh. Maggie. What are you doing?
Oh! What a naughty bird. Shhh!

Ups, sorry.
Maggie! Shhhh.

Hey Steve, I want to tell you some…
Not now Maggie. Look at this mess. Oh! Pick

up the pictures and put them back in the correct
place.

OK. Sorry.
Oh, Maggie. What a naughty, naughty bird.

Hey Steve, who´s this?
Oh. Look, that´s my mum. Yeah. My mum likes

to play volleyball. Oh great Maggie, yeah.
My mum always says „I want to play volleyball.

I want to play volleyball.“ Yeah!
Oh. Hey, look. Maggie´s got another picture.

Who´s this Steve?
Hey, who is it? Yeah, it´s my brother.

A-ha.
My brother likes to play the guitar.

Oh, here.
My brother always says „I want to play the

guitar. I want to play the guitar.“ Yeah.
Oh Maggie, super! Another picture.

Who´s this Steve?
Who is it? It´s my sister. My sister likes

to play tennis. Yeah!
A-ha.

She´s always saying „I want to play tennis.
I want to play tennis.“ Yeah!

Oh hey, who´s this? You know who this is,
don´t you?

Yeah!
Yeah, it´s my dad.

Dad!
Oh, well done Maggie. Yeah, look! My dad likes

to play the piano. He always says „I want
to play the piano. I want to play the piano.“

Hihi.
Oh thanks Maggie. Look, all the pictures in

the correct place.
Yeah!

Now, what did you want to say?
My brothers and sisters are coming!

Oh, your brother and sister?
No, my brothers and sisters!

Your brothers and sisters!
Hello. Come in. How many brothers and sisters

have you got?
Lots and lots.

Please be quiet the baby is sleeping. Shhhhh.
Oh no, too late. Bye-bye everybody. See you
next time.
It's Steve and Maggie.

Oh, Hello. It’s you. I thought were Maggie.
I am hungry, so I am going for a midnight

feast. Let’s see what I’ve got in my fridge.
Hihi. Oh, look. Yogurt. Do you like yogurt?

I do.
Yogurt finger, yogurt finger where are you?

Here I am, here I am. Do you want some too?
Mmm.

It’s delicious. Oh, but what’s that? It’s
sweeter and even more delicious. Look. Hihi.

It’s honey. Do you like honey? I do.
Honey finger, honey finger where are you?

Here I am, here I am. Do you want some too?
Mmm.

That’s fantastic. But I know Maggie’s
got some chocolate, somewhere around here.

Maggie’s chocolate might be in this cupboard.
Let’s have a look.

AHA! Oh. Hey! That’s not chocolate. It’s
jam. But I like jam. Do you? Yeah? Hahahi.

Jam finger, jam finger where are you? Here
I am, here I am. Do you want some too? Mmm.

Ohh. That’s lovely. But I am sure Maggie’s
chocolate is somewhere. Let’s have a look

in these drawers. No. NO! Oh, YES! Haha. I
found the chocolate. Chocolate is my favorite.

Is it yours? Yeah!
Chocolate finger, chocolate finger where are

you? Here I am, here I am. Do you want some
too? Mmm.

That’s lovely. But I better put it back.
Hihi. Now, I fancy some ice-cream. Hey!

Ice-cream, ice-cream where are you? There
you are, there you are. I love you? Come on.

Let’s have some ice-cream. Hey! Ice-cream.
This will be delicious. Do you like ice-cream?

I love ice-cream.
Ice-cream finger, ice-cream finger where are

you? Here I am, here I am. Do you want some
too? Mmm. Hmmmm. Mm. Hm.

Steve? Steve?! Oh no, Maggie’s coming! Oh,
o. Hey! Hello Maggie. What are you doing?

Oh, we’re just singing the finger family.
Oh, hello. Yeah! Really? Show me your fingers.

Ok. Come on. Sing with me again. Are you ready?
Abracadabra! Oh, Maggie. Hey look, it’s

the finger family. You know the song, don’t
you. Sing it with me.

Daddy finger, daddy finger where are you?
Here I am, here I am. Oh, how do you do? Hello

daddy finger, nice to meet you. How’s next?
Mummy finger, mummy finger where are you?

Here I am, here I am. Oh, how do you do? Hello
mummy finger. Look, it’s brother finger

next.
Brother finger, brother finger where are you?

Here I am, here I am. Oh, how do you do? Nice
to meet you brother finger, who’s next?

Yeah!
Sister finger, sister finger where are you?

Here I am, here I am. Oh, how do you do? Nice
to meet you sister finger. The last one is

the baby.
Baby finger, baby finger where are you? Uaah,

uaah. Oh, how do you do. Hey. Wow! Thanks.
You see Maggie. They know the finger family

song. Yeah. That was great. Let’s sing it
again. Hold up your other hand. OK. Abracadabra.

Oh, wow! Look at all the animals. Can you
find the lion? Yeah!

Lion finger, lion finger where are you? Here
I am, here I am. Roar, roar, roar! Wow! Now,

find the snake.
Snake finger, snake finger where are you?

Here I am, here I am. Ssss, sss, ssss! Wow!
Oh, I don’t like snakes. Where’s the parrot?

Parrot finger, parrot finger where are you?
Here I am, here I am. Squawk, squawk, squawk!

Oh, what a noisy parrot. Where’s the elephant?
Elephant finger, elephant finger where are

you? Here I am, here I am. Hoo, hoo, hoo!
Wow! Now, can you find the monkey?

Monkey finger, monkey finger where are you?
Here I am, here I am. Whoop, whoop, whoop!

Hihi. Wow! Ok. Thank you. Hey Maggie that
was great! Yeah! Oh, hey Steve. Let’s have

a midnight feast. Hihi. Ehm, no thank you
Maggie. Oh. I think I’ll go to bed. Ok,

see you. Bye bye. Night, night. Night, night
Steve. Ho. Haha. I think Steve’s got some

ice-cream here. Yeah! Haha. Ice-cream, ice-cream,
where are you?
It's Steve and Maggie.

Hey. Hi. Come and say hello to more of my
family.

Say hello to my uncle. Hello Steve's uncle.
Hello Steve's uncle. Hello uncle. What does

he want to do? He wants to play tennis. It's
true. He wants to play tennis with you. Oh

great. I want that too. Hihi. Yeah.
Say hello to my auntie. Hello Steve's auntie.

Hello Steve's auntie. Hello auntie. What does
she want to do? She wants to play volleyball.

It's true. She wants to play volleyball with
you. Oh great. I want that too.

Say hello to my cousin. Hello Steve's cousin.
Hello Steve's cousin. Hello cousin. What does

he want to do? He wants to play football.
It's true. He wants to play football with

you. Oh great. I want that too. Hihi. Yeah.
Say hello to my brother. Hello Steve's brother.

Hello Steve's brother. Hello brother. What
does he want to do? He wants to play on the

swing. It's true. He wants to play on the
swing with you. Oh great. I want that too.

Hihi. Yeah.
Hey. Bye bye. See you next time.

Heyyyy. Hey. Did you like that? Yeah? Then
please like it, if you love it, you can subscribe.
